name: Scout Recon
Lore: 'Familiarity with native terrain is essential to a scout garrison. Imperial command can also put this type of information to effective use.',
Text: 'Add 1 to landspeed of your scout at an exterior planet site for remainder of turn. OR If Igar is with Grond or Dyer in battle, draw one destiny and subtract if from opponent''s attrition against you.',
